DOC.brief_summary: To compare efficacy escitalopram fix dose 20 mg/day combination fix dos gaboxadol ( 5 10 mg/day ) versus escitalopram fix dose 20 mg/day 8 week treatment patient Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.brief_title: Short-term Study Combination Treatment Escitalopram Gaboxadol Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects participate study respectively randomise ( 1:2:2:2 ) receive either : - placebo - escitalopram 20 mg/day - escitalopram 20 mg/day combination gaboxadol 5 mg/day - escitalopram 20 mg/day combination gaboxadol 10 mg/day
